title: Matthew Shively • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #68
itunes:title: Matthew Shively • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #68
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with acting treasure, Nickelodeon and otherwise, MATTHEW SHIVELY!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with acting treasure, Nickelodeon and otherwise, MATTHEW SHIVELY!


To call Matt a child star may risk belittling his achievements, as he has done a huge amount since his early days as Ryan Laserbeam on Nickelodeon’s ‘True Jackson VP’, and you will hear about that very role and all said post-Nick goodness in this thoroughly enjoyable chat with he and Brett! As always, we get deep into our guest’s soul right here, with all manner of life nuggets and wisdom gems being learned and distributed, from those early days acting, being king of the pratfall, his current housing situation and how he arrived there, what he learned from the show, a good Bad Boys chunk which leads to an interesting real life entanglement, whether the enjoyment of film is altered after being so exposed to the inner workings of the machine, the echoes in every day life of a horror film, VERY controversial thoughts on horror films in general, acting coaches and auditions, Shia Labeouf, the beauty of a one-shot and what’s coming soon in his own career. Action packed! Get you some!


EPISODE LINKS:

• MATTHEW on WIKIPEDIA!

• MATTHEW on INSTAGRAM!

• MATTHEW FANDOM!

• TRUE JACKSON VP!

• BESTIES!


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT on INSTAGRAM!

• BRETT on PATREON!

• FTBBW PODCAST MERCHANDISE!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!


• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM
